select tb.purchaseId,tu.real_name as ownName,tb.purchaseType, tb.totalPrice,tu.address ,tb.purchaseStatus ,tb.createTime , tb.updateTime,tb.picture from tb_user as tu, (SELECT DISTINCT tb1.purchase_id as purchaseId, tb1.own_name as ownName, tb1.purchase_type as purchaseType, tb1.total_price as totalPrice, tb1.address as address, tb1.purchase_status as purchaseStatus, tb1.create_time as createTime, tb1.update_time as updateTime,tb3.picture as picture FROM tb_purchase AS tb1,tb_purchase_detail AS tb2,tb_order AS tb3 WHERE tb1.own_name=#{name} AND tb1.purchase_id = tb2.purchase_id AND tb2.order_id = tb3.order_id GROUP BY tb1.purchase_id) as tb WHERE tu.user_name = tb.ownName
